Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Swiss_Prot Entry P84911]has antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria S.aureus and S.hemolyticus, and against the Gram-negative bacterium E.coli. Reduced antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacterium B.subtilis. No antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative bacterium P.fluorescens
Sequence Information.Function: Inhibits papain, ficin and bromelain with an IC50 of 0.09 µM, 0.115 µM and 0.113 µM respectively. Has antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and against the Gram-negative bacteria. Reduced antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacterium B.subtilis. No antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative bacterium P.fluorescens.
Sequence Information.Miscellaneous: Stable in the pH range 5.0-9.0 at 37 degrees Celsius. Stable when incubated in the temperature range 25-75 degrees Celsius and pH 7.5.

Literature.Title: Isolation, characterization and kinetics of goat cystatins.
Literature.Reference: Comp Biochem Physiol B Biochem Mol Biol. 2005 Dec;142(4)361-368.
Literature.Author: Sadaf Z, Shahid PB, Bilqees B.
